actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 in order to facilitate the enforcement of the ocean dumping laws by requiring that dye or other effective visual marking be used to identify where wastes are dumped.

summary.text: Requires that dye or other effective visual markings be used to identify where wastes are dumped in the ocean under title I of the Marine Protection, Research and Sanctuaries Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 in order to facilitate the enforcement of the ocean dumping laws by requiring that dye or other effective visual marking be used to identify where wastes are dumped.
